title: Rebind centered hub logo image by deterministic unmount/remount without visual changes

requirements.summary: Force the centered hub logo element to be removed and reinserted (asset rebinding) while keeping src strictly "/logo2-1.png" and preserving all existing styling/layout and asset validation behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: The centered hub logo still references only src "/logo2-1.png" and does not introduce any references to "/logo2.png" or other filenames.
There is an explicit, deterministic code path that unmounts and remounts the hub logo image element (remove + reinsert) to rebind the asset.
No visual/layout/styling changes occur to the hub logo or halo ring: same size, same centering, same z-index layering, same shadows/filters, same pointer-events behavior.
Existing asset validation, Asset Scan Results gating, and missing-asset enforcement behavior remains unchanged.

file_operations.description: Implement a deterministic asset-rebinding mechanism that explicitly unmounts and remounts only the centered hub logo element (e.g., via a two-phase render toggle or a changing React key triggered once on mount), while keeping the src exactly "/logo2-1.png" and leaving all existing classes, inline styles, sizing, positioning, z-index, halo ring styling, and pointer-events behavior unchanged.
